definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: come up (Aram. loan-word in BH, q.v.);—

definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[סִלְקַת]] Da 7:20, [[תָ֠]] (!) v:Da 7:28 (K:§ 25 b)); 3 mpl. [[סְלִ֫קוּ]] Da 2:29, Ezr 4:12; Pt. fpl. [[סָֽלְקָן]] Da 7:3;—come up, [[מִן]] pers. Ezr 4:12, [[מִן־יַמָּא]] Da 7:3; abs. of horn in vision Da 7:8, Da 7:20; fig. of thoughts Da 2:29.

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: lift, take up: Pf. 3 mpl. [[הַסִּ֫קוּ]] (as if from [[נסק]]; K:§ 44 b)) Da 3:22; Inf. [[לְהַנְסָקָה]] (K:l. e. Str:§ 3 h) Da 6:24 ([[מִן]] loc.), both c. [[ל]] acc. pers.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: (W:CG225) be taken up: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֻסַּק]] Da 6:24 ([[מִן]] loc.).
